event.title: educational classes and lectures for nine weeks

data.event: Chautauqua Institution is approximately 17 miles away, offering music, theater, educational classes and lectures for nine weeks during the summer.
His family purchased 3,500 acres (14 km2) in 1806, in the area now known as Chautauqua County.

event.title: explored the area that is now

data.event: James Prendergast explored the area that is now Jamestown.

event.title: purchased 1,000 acres (4.0 km2) of land in the area in 1808

data.event: Prendergast saw the area to be valuable, and so he purchased 1,000 acres (4.0 km2) of land in the area in 1808.

event.title: fall of 1809, Prendergast and an employee, John Blowers built

data.event: In the fall of 1809, Prendergast and an employee, John Blowers built a log cabin, which became the first building in Jamestown.
In 1855, Nightwatch was created for the purpose of looking out for fires.
